languages.text: {n}Глаза Руолдо при ваших словах вылезают из орбит. Он нервно сглатывает, после чего неловко кивает.{/n}
{n}Ruoldo's eyes nearly pop from their sockets at your words. He gulps and nods awkwardly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Руолдо при ваших словах вылезают из орбит. Он нервно сглатывает, после чего неловко кивает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到你的话，罗尔多的眼睛几乎都要从眼窝里瞪出来了。他咽了口口水，尴尬地点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo's eyes nearly pop from their sockets at your words. He gulps and nods awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的话，罗尔多的眼睛几乎都要从眼窝里瞪出来了。他咽了口口水，尴尬地点了点头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉に、ルオルドの目は今にも飛び出さんばかりに見開かれた。彼はごくりと唾を飲み込み、ぎこちなくうなずいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo's eyes nearly pop from their sockets at your words. He gulps and nods awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉に、ルオルドの目は今にも飛び出さんばかりに見開かれた。彼はごくりと唾を飲み込み、ぎこちなくうなずいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A Ruoldo casi se le salen los ojos de sus órbitas cuando oye tus palabras. Traga saliva y asiente con nerviosismo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo's eyes nearly pop from their sockets at your words. He gulps and nods awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A Ruoldo casi se le salen los ojos de sus órbitas cuando oye tus palabras. Traga saliva y asiente con nerviosismo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu sözlerin üzerine Ruoldo'nun gözleri, yuvalarından fırlayacak gibi oluyor. Yutkunup beceriksizce başını sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo's eyes nearly pop from their sockets at your words. He gulps and nods awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu sözlerin üzerine Ruoldo'nun gözleri, yuvalarından fırlayacak gibi oluyor. Yutkunup beceriksizce başını sallıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Ruoldo menacent de jaillir de leurs orbites à vos paroles. Il déglutit et hoche la tête d'un air embarrassé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo's eyes nearly pop from their sockets at your words. He gulps and nods awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Ruoldo menacent de jaillir de leurs orbites à vos paroles. Il déglutit et hoche la tête d'un air embarrassé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo reißt angesichts deiner Worte die Augen auf. Dann schluckt er und nickt verlegen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo's eyes nearly pop from their sockets at your words. He gulps and nods awkwardly.{/n}
